short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UrbanTabs is a new tab extension that provides a beautiful and minimalistic experience for your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Refresh your home page with some city views from all around the world!
Users can shuffle the backgrounds by clicking the button on the top right corner of the screen. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the UrbanTabs Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use.
The search results will be provided by Yahoo.

Privacy Policy - https://urbantabs.com/privacy.html
Terms and Conditions - https://urbantabs.com/terms.html
Contact Us - https://urbantabs.com/contact.html
